revisionDesc.tei:change: Added references to local authority file (/BachUni/BachBibliothek/GitHub/OpenArabicPE/authority-files/data/tei/gazetteer_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml) and to GeoNames IDs to placeNames without such references based on places mentioned in the authority file.

Added references to local authority file (/BachUni/BachBibliothek/GitHub/OpenArabicPE/authority-files/data/tei/personography_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml) and VIAF to persNames without such references based on persons in the local authority file. If the source persName did not contain any further TEI mark-up, this has been added from the local authority file.
Corrected biblStruct by sorting child elements in the correct order. Converted all n on biblScope to from and towith identical values.
revisionDesc.change: Added automated xml:ids for every element that is a descendant of tei:textand had no existing xml:idfollowing the pattern "name()_generate-id()"
revisionDesc.tei:change: Added xml:lang to all nodes that lacked this attribute. The value is based on the closest ancestor.
revisionDesc.change: Generated this file by automatic conversion from Sente XML
